property.name: zeppelin.tarball.url
property.description: URL location of pre-build Zeppelin tarball (tar.gz).

property.name: zeppelin.install.dir
property.description: Local dir where to install component. incubator-zeppelin folder will be created as a subdir of this dir e.g. /opt/incubator-zeppelin

property.name: zeppelin.temp.file
property.description: Temporary file where pre-built package will be downloaded to. If your env has limited space under /tmp, change this to different location. In this case you must ensure that the zeppelin user must be able to write to this location.
